applyToSelf.hint: If enabled this aura will apply to the source token.
applyToSelf.label: Apply to Self

bestFormula.hint: A formula to evaluate with the source actor's roll data to determine the most powerful effect in a non-stacking situation. If left blank, first-come, first-serve.
bestFormula.label: "Best" Formula

canStack.hint: If enabled, other auras of the same name can apply at the same time to any applicable tokens.
canStack.label: Aura Can Stack

collisionTypes.hint: Which, if any, types of wall will stop this aura.
collisionTypes.label: Collision Types

combatOnly.hint: If enabled, this effect will be suppressed outside of combat.
combatOnly.label: Combat Only

disableOnHidden.hint: If enabled, this effect will be suppressed while the token it is on is hidden.
disableOnHidden.label: Disable While Hidden

disposition.hint: Which token dispositions (relative to the source token) this aura will apply to.
disposition.label: Disposition

distanceFormula.hint: Specifies the radius that this aura extends to (roll data is accepted).
distanceFormula.label: Distance

evaluatePreApply.hint: If enabled, change values will be evaluated prior to effect application, using the source actor's roll data if necessary.
evaluatePreApply.label: Evaluate Changes Early

opacity.hint: How opaque or transparent the aura should appear.
opacity.label: Opacity

overrideName.hint: What name the applied effect should have (leave blank to use base effect's name).
overrideName.label: Effect Name

script.hint: An expression which, if true (or blank) means the aura should apply.
script.label: Conditional Script

showRadius.hint: Whether to display aura borders for every user.
showRadius.label: Show Radius

AURAEFFECTS.ConvertToAuraHint: This will immediately transform this effect into an Aura source effect.
AURAEFFECTS.ConvertToNormalHint: This will immediately revert this effect to its original type; aura settings will be lost.

AURAEFFECTS.NoActiveGM: Aura Effects will not attempt to function without a GM logged in.

DisableScrollingText.Hint: Disable the scrolling text that appears when adding/removing aura-caused effects to a token's actor.
DisableScrollingText.Name: Disable Scrolling Text for Aura Effects

DisableVisuals.Hint: Disable aura radius visualization entirely, regardless of effect settings.
DisableVisuals.Name: Disable Visuals

ExactCircles.Hint: When enabled, visualized auras will be shown as perfect circles when "Grid Diagonals" is set to "Exact." (This can result in inaccurate visualizations around the edges of circles, especially with larger aura radii).
ExactCircles.Name: Show Circles with Exact Diagonals
